tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently had a dental treatment at Galaxy Dental Care  under the care of Dr. Krishna, and I am extremely pleased with the excellent service I received. Dr. Krishna's expertise and professionalism were evident throughout the entire process.
The clinic itself is well-maintained and equipped with modern technology, ensuring a comfortable and efficient experience. 
During the procedure, Dr. Krishna displayed a high level of skill and precision. Their gentle approach and attention to detail helped alleviate any anxiety I had. The staff at Galaxy Dental Care was also friendly and accommodating, creating a welcoming atmosphere.
Post-treatment, I am very satisfied with the results. Dr. Krishna's dedication to ensuring the best outcome for their patients is evident in the quality of work they provide. I highly recommend Galaxy Dental Care and Dr. Krishna to anyone seeking exceptional dental care. My experience was truly outstanding, and I am grateful for their expertise and care.
Overall, Galaxy Dental Care and Dr. Krishna have exceeded my expectations, and I would not hesitate to return for any future dental needs. Thank you for the wonderful service!

review: Excellent at explaining things. Proactive in specifying the issues and making patients aware of and not to panic and handle it with ease. During cap setup, I was happy, but still the fine tuning was achieved Doctor is not. Am able to realise the minute adjustment and never had the feeling that there is a new cap after the cap placed. Thanks much and appreciate the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: All the 3 doctors who treated me were so good and very well organised with expertise. Dr. Archana did root canal literally painless for which I was little worried but process went very smooth and painless. Dr. Krishna priya did capping with so much comfort by making sure I am comfortable. Dr Pranita’s scaling process went very good too. Reception staff is polite. Overall very satisfying experience. Thank You😊 I would highly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thanks to Dr. Krishna Priya. She was very professional and explained the whole procedure very patiently and cleared all my doubts with absolute clarity and made me feel very comfortable throughout the process. She helped me in selecting the bridge and explained the advantages of it. The treatment was also almost painless and I was taken care properly during the process. I recommend Dr. Krishna Priya and Appollo White Dental for Dental treatments.
